title: White beans with herbs
ingredients: ['450g dried white beans, like cannellini', '500 to 750ml vegetable or chicken stock, or water', '2 garlic cloves, finely chopped', '1 small red onion, chopped', 'drizzle of olive oil', '1 bay leaf, or', '2 to 3 sage leaves, or', '1 rosemary sprig', 'salt and pepper to taste']
